item.title: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

Help Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life, as he explores a forgotten and broken world. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

An Original Soundtrack

Weaved into the world is an incredible original soundtrack created by Seeking Blue artists Yoe Mase, Hahlweg and Tal Richards (formerly of Echos), currently in development.


Mailing List

Join the Mailing List and be the first to learn about the future of Sheepy, limited edition merch and more.

item.title: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the Jump+ Dimensions!

Damien's life is flipped upside-down when his family moves him to Japan. A shy boy, he copes with his newfound loneliness with the power of his infinite imagination and creates an imaginary hero named "Captain Velvet Meteor"! Damien sets off on an adventure with his favorite Jump+ heroes in his imaginary world and fights to adjust to his new home and find himself.

Become Captain Velvet Meteor and help Damien conquer his fears in a tactical adventure enjoyable for players of all ages and skill levels!

○ Combat


Experience Damien's struggles living in Japan for the first time as he interacts with his family in his Grandmother's home. Then, dive into the Jump+ Dimensions, the world of Damien's imagination, where he takes part in strategic battles with the heroes or heroines from Jump+ mangas to fight the various sources of Damien’s worries.


Battles take place on a tactical grid and include unique puzzles where you manipulate the environment to meet mission objectives. Damien and the Jump+ characters have unique attacks, including melee, ranged, and charged attacks. Use signature attacks of your Jump+ companions through Power and Assist Combos to unleash massive damage on hordes of enemies!

○ Exploration


The exploration phase allows you to explore Damien's new home in Japan freely. Damien encounters various cultural elements that make him anxious, such as neighbors and his late grandfather’s portrait. To overcome these obstacles, Damien journeys to the imaginary world to become Captain Velvet Meteor, and fight through numerous epic battles. The player’s actions will determine which worlds you end up fighting in.


Born to a French father and a Japanese mother, a shy boy, Damien, moves to Japan so the entire family can live with his Japanese grandmother. However, everything Damien sees and touches in his new Japanese home is full of worrying elements, such as their pet dog growing aggressive from the stress of changing homes, unknown Japanese dishes being served during meals, and encountering unfamiliar insects during bathtime!

Damien, struggling to cope with his new life in Japan, becomes the hero Captain Velvet Meteor and sets off to explore his imaginary world and face his numerous fears. The heroes and heroines from Damien’s favorite Jump+ manga series are joining him during these epic mini-adventures. Can you guide Captain Velvet Meteor and his manga buddies past their challenges and find emotional comfort amidst the cultural turmoil?

Damien, aka Captain Velvet Meteor!

Shy boy Damien is prompted by his move to Japan to become the imaginary hero Captain Velvet Meteor. Teaming up with numerous characters from the hit Jump+ manga series, Damien faces his fears and overcomes his challenges one by one.

Meet the Jump+ heroes and heroines teaming up with Captain Velvet Meteor!


From left to right:
  • The Princess and her holy sword EX from “'Tis Time for "Torture" Princess”
  • Kafka Hibino from “Kaiju No. 8”
  • Slime from “Slime Life”
  • Chrome from “HEART GEAR”
  • Loid Forger from “SPY×FAMILY”
  • Ushio Kofune from “Summer Time Rendering”
  • Chloé Love and Kai Iod from “Ghost Reaper Girl”
  • Gabimaru from “Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku”



Momo-Pi Game Studio is a small team based in Switzerland. They have members based in Switzerland and Japan and combine their cultural backgrounds and experiences to create unique and original ideas.

item.title: AstroForge: Space Pirates
item.description:
About This Game

In this game, you design your own spaceship. You have over 50 hull variants of different sizes and over 100 variants of installations: turrets, containers, living modules, boarding pods, amplifiers, power generators, armor, shield generators and much more.

Open World

.
Set out to explore the open world in the Rubezh star cluster. Here you will meet representatives of 15 factions and 13 intelligent races. Fight with them, trade or keep neutral - only your choice. Travel between more than 35 planets, explore nebulae, asteroids and anomalies.
AstroForge gives you complete freedom of action on the way to your goal. Fight or trade, complete missions or attack entire planets.

Unique combat system


Ships are made up of cells, each with its own level of armor and functional setup. Each cell is destroyed separately.
To win, you need to destroy certain cells of your opponent's ship or fulfill other conditions. You have several options:
  • Deprive the enemy of energy.
  • Destroy all gun turrets.
  • Leave the ship without crew.
  • Board the ship.

During combat, your guns fire automatically, but you can choose to target them: a specific cell or a type of cell. Use special skills to gain an advantage.
If you win, you get some of the equipment and resources from your opponent's ship, which you can sell or use to improve your ship.

Game Features:

  • Simple and clear interface, which is easy to understand. However, on high difficulty levels and in multiplayer you will have to try hard to win.
  • Single-player story campaign mode, where you have a goal and complete freedom of action. You can achieve it in any way you want.
  • Compete with other players in multiplayer. Earn money and rankings in different modes to progress.
  • The political and economic systems of the Rubezh cluster. Prices vary from planet to planet, factions can fight among themselves or be allies.
  • Hire crew on planets, gain experience in battles and evolve.
  • Complete missions for different factions, from courier deliveries to attacking entire planets.
  • The game is available in 17 languages.

item.title: Duel Revolution
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Duel Revolution, the ultimate monster battling MMO!


In this game, you will explore the island of Bitacora filled with all kinds of monsters, known as Evo. Catch and train these creatures to become the strongest Evo duelist and engage in intense real-time battles against other players.

Key features of Duel Revolution:


Catch and Train: 50 unique Evo, each with its own set of abilities. Every Evo in Duel Revolution is unique. It's up to you to figure out the best strategy for using each Evo in battle. Keep an eye out as we're constantly adding new Evo with upcoming updates!

Intense Duels: Challenge other players in real-time duels or face off against wild Evo and other duelists as you explore the island.

Engaged Community: Join a community of enthusiastic Evo duelists, share tips and strategies, and make new friends.

Skilltree-based Leveling System: With 12 meaningful levels, you can tailor the skills and strengths of your Evo to match your gameplay style.

Customize Your Character: Choose from various customization options to make your character stand out and showcase your style in the game.

Regular Updates and New Content: We are committed to delivering regular updates and fresh content to keep the game exciting.

Gameplay Preview:


Encounter wild Evo on the way.


Go to the Duel Stop to heal your Evo, buy items or duel against others.


The Deep Cave is filled with challenging co-op puzzles, strong Evo and various secrets.


Watch the duel of others by a tap on the bouncing box over their head.


Enjoy surfing on the beach with your friends.


Each level let's you choose a new attack or ability.


Customize your character to your preferences.


Welcome new players at the station in Lapin City.


Play the FREE open beta now!

item.title: All City King
item.description:
About This Game

All City King is a stealth game where the player takes the role of an up-and-coming street
artist. Your target is the subway trains and your goal is to make your art travel all over the
city.
Some games allow you to heist a bank where you take out the guards and escape with a
giant pay-check. But in All City King, your “bank” is the trains, and your “pay-check” is your
art or whatever message you feel fit to share. Enter the subway quietly, make your mark on
the trains, and get out.
As you start your career as a street artist and after you have learned the ropes, your goal is
to spray paint subway cars in increasingly difficult missions. Sneak past patrolling security
guards, leave your mark on subway trains, and watch as your masterpiece leaves the
station!

Music by: Lars Bjerkholt Skotnes

item.title: Math Dash
item.description:
About This Game

What is MathDash? MathDash is not just another game—it’s an exhilarating journey where you can level up your brainpower while having a blast! 🧠💥

🎮 Gameplay Highlights:

🏃‍♂️ Race Against Time: Solve math problems as you dash through captivating landscapes.
🧩 Puzzle Challenges: Tackle brain-teasing puzzles that get trickier with each level.

Why MathDash? Because learning math doesn’t have to be dull! Whether you’re a student, a parent, or just someone who loves numbers, MathDash is here to make math entertaining, engaging, and rewarding.

item.title: PlunderPiece
item.description:
About This Game

Plunderpeice is a game all about plundering coins with given chess pieces. The pieces can move around exactly how you would expect from chess, and they collect all the coins in their path. Can you collect all the coins in the fewest moves possible?

In the beginning, place the pieces wherever you would like. Each piece must be placed on the board before you can make moves.

Create arrows to plan your strategy.

Earn medals based on your performance. Up to 6 moves over target gives bronze, 3 moves over target gives silver, and hitting or beating the target gives gold.

Comes with a total of 50 levels, with 10 4x4 levels, 10 6x6 levels, 10 8x8 levels, 10 10x10 levels, and 10 12x12 levels.

Achievements coming soon


Music in the trailer: Immortality - by Nojisuma. Licensed from Pixibay

item.title: 100 Rounds
item.description:
About This Game

A die and retry with 100 levels, simple gameplay and hours of rage quit. You can play solo or join a friend for multiplayer and free/demo exist

Free version :

  • Levels 80
  • Boss 8
  • Ennemies 23
  • Join online mode ✅
  • Host online mode ❌
  • Skin ❌
  • Archievements 0

Full game version :

  • Levels 100
  • Boss 10
  • Ennemies 35
  • Join online mode ✅
  • Host online mode ✅
  • Skin ✅
  • Archievements 17

item.title: Legend of Marrow
item.description:
About This Game

Story

  • Marrow found herself in a heavily rainy place, the droplets pounding against her skin like a relentless drumbeat. She had been drawn here by a mysterious force, one that she couldn't quite explain. All she knew was that she had to be here, in this place of darkness and wetness.

  • As she made her way deeper into the rain-soaked forest, Marrow encountered a series of obstacles and puzzles that challenged her both physically and mentally. She had to navigate through treacherous terrain, avoiding slippery rocks and jagged roots that threatened to trip her up at every turn. She had to solve riddles and puzzles that were carved into the bark of the trees, their answers hidden in the intricate patterns of the trees and branches that covered them.

  • Despite the challenges, Marrow refused to give up. She had a sense of purpose, a sense of determination that she had never felt before. She knew that she was on a mission, one that was vital to her very existence.

  • What lay at the end of the path, Marrow had no idea. But she knew that she had to find out. She had to know what lay at the heart of this place, and what it was that had brought her here.

Hero Definition

  • Marrow encounters a series of obstacles and puzzles that challenges through her journey both physically and mentally.

Key Features!

  • Chapters: Upon discovering the story, revisit the old places and collect any missable items.
  • Collectibles: A rewarding collectible system: gather a collection and be rewarded.
  • Documents: The historical people who wrote them will guide you through your journey.
  • Exploration: An abandoned, dark town filled with obstacles, puzzles, and danger.
  • Flashlight: Be aware of the battery amounts, or you won’t be able to see some places!
  • Inventory: You'll be short on the available slots; find a way to extend them.
  • Mystery: Discover the dark, mysterious events in the story.
  • Puzzles: Focus on the things you collect and the things you see to solve the puzzles!
  • Rain: Don’t let your guard down in the biting cold rain.

item.title: The Collar
item.description:
About This Game

The Collar welcomes you.

Each of you have been hand picked from your normal life to participate in the experiment. You should be very honored The Collar has chosen you.

You have all been fitted with an identical collar. Each collar has a timer. Each of you have random times set on your timer. Once the trial begins, each collar will start to countdown to zero.

The collar lights glow indicating how much time you have left. The collar glowing green means it has the most time. The collar glowing red means it has the least time. The collars glowing yellow are in-between.

If your collar reaches zero, you will die.

If you die before your collar reaches zero, the closest person to you will receive your remaining time.

If you give up, The Collar will kill you.

Only one will survive.
Kill or be killed. Your choice.
The Collar doesn't care.

A Different Experience

The Collar is a physics based first person game that pits you against strangers in a realistic way. This is not your typical "fighting" or "first person" game. You are not a ninja, or have magic, or some mythical creature with special powers. You are a regular human being. You fight like a regular human being. You can be hurt like a regular human being. There are things that are difficult as they would be in the real world. Choose to fight or be stealthy or come up with a different gameplay strategy all on your own. This game is a simulation of an experience.

Abilities

  • Crouch/Walk/Run
  • Climb/Slide
  • Swim/Dive
  • Fight

Environmental Weapons

  • The Dowel: A rounded rod of wood to whack those who dare.
  • The Rock: A hard broken piece of earth ready to smash anyone.
  • The Stick: A stick given by the trees to whip whoever comes near you.

Weapons

  • The Axe: A sharpened steel blade affixed a strong wooden handle that will cut down anyone in its path.
  • The Baseball Bat: A deadly hard piece of spun wood that will crack the head of even the strongest.
  • The Crowbar: A curved, hardened, piece of steel, although small, can break a bone or a back in a single swing.

Environment

From hot and cold to falling and drowning, the environment can cause some big problems. Even death.

Cold climates will cause Hypothermia.
Hot climates can cause Heatstroke.

And do not even try to escape during the experiment. The Collar knows.

MESSAGE FROM THE DEV

The Collar is being designed in order to provide a different online multiplayer experience. From sound, realism, emersion, and minimalistic design, my game development process is designed to allow the player to enter worlds like they were a part of a movie you would normally watch, but now get to be the main character.

The Collar has been in development for over two years. I am very proud of The Collar in its current state. I want to keep adding meaningful content for another 1-2 years whilst still living up to the goal of a realistic experience. I am fully prepared for it to take even longer, if it means a better and a more well-rounded experience in the end. The game is not perfect and I understand that, which is why I have a roadmap of things I want to improve and iterate on to make this game experience better over time. The community has always helped shape and mold the game as it stands today and will definitely continue to do so as the community grows.

This passion game of mine does not end at Steam release, but is only the beginning. I am sure we will have plenty more interactions and I cannot wait to see where this journey takes us together. I enjoy playing my own game especially with friends and soon with new friends I am sure I will meet along the way. If you see me in a match, jump in and say hi! It is fun to hear additional impressions of the game and play style. Until then, The Collar is waiting.

WARNING

The Collar contains flashing lights, patterns, and images which may not be suitable for photosensitive epilepsy. If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing The Collar, dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions, IMMEDIATELY discontinue use and consult your physician before resuming playing The Collar.

The Collar contains scenes of realistic graphic violence and gore and may be disturbing to some. Under no circumstances should you attempt to do any of the things that happen in this game in real life. If you are easily offended or have a hard time separating fantasy from reality, this game is probably not for you.

item.title: Pincrediball
item.description:
About This Game

Pincrediball is a fun twist on the pinball game genre. You design the Pinball machine, and the Automata Pinball Wizard follows a "Playbook" to play your design. Achieve High Scores and earn medals to advance levels.

How to play


Think of a "Machine" as a "World" with stages (or "levels"). At each level you unlock new components to add to the Pinball machine. Place these components in the right spots on the machine, and hit "Run Playbook" to see what score it gets you.

With some tiny spoilers, here's one way to handle the Tutorial Machine's final stage:



Every playbook must end by draining the ball (at the bottom of the machine) within the given time limit. If you succeed, your score will count and gets you a bronze, silver, or even gold medal if you cross a certain target. At least bronze is needed to advance a level.

Going for silver and gold after bronze? Or advance to the next level? It's your choice! And you could also go back to go full completionist on a level!!

What is included?


Pincrediball has many features, including (but not limited to):

  • A Tutorial Machine (a "world") with several levels to play.
  • Target scores (bronze, silver, gold) and a progression system, based on high scores.
  • A multi-multi-multi-ball "Stress Test" mode to test your setup, or just for fun!

The trailer showcases all these features as well as many others.

About the Development


This game was created as a solo sabbatical project. You can read about the full development history on the website's devlog, and even view the source code (written for the Godot 4 engine).

item.title: Journey of the Forgotten
item.description:
About This Game



Gather your party or survive alone as you explore the great Continent of Tarkia, unveiling the evil that was shown in your vision.

Your playing as Quia the lone child of two heroes, fallen and forgotten. As your magic power awakens, you need to come prepared or the onslaught of monsters will be your doom.

From TwoSoulFox comes a Retro RPG, set in the beautiful world of hand-made maps. Old Fantasy and no auto-generated content.





Learn to master the new Soul Dancer RPG class and add up to three more allies to your ranks choosing your difficulty that way. Ride your own horse and reduce the amount of monsters that can keep up with you. No matter where you go, adventure, loot and battle might find you. Will you help villagers and look for hidden treasures?



Enjoy the completed storyline of the Legendary Four Crystals as the game expands and the indie developer adds more chapters to the game extending your experience and developing the story, watch the characters overcome greater challenges with the stakes rising. Caught in a conflict between humans, devils, and deities you will determine the fate of the whole party and their entire world. No loot boxes, DLC or season pass needed.




Forged with the blood and sweat of TwoSoulFox Studios, Journey of the Forgotten gives you unprecedented freedom to explore, experiment, and interact with a thriving world filled with characters, dangers, and traps. A true author's narrative enhances your playthrough and can be adapted based on player feedback. Join the Discord. From maze-like forests, to the abandoned Mithril Mines, to the darkness-filled castle of the mastermind itself, your choices will be remembered. Will your strategies succeed and will you become a master of the craft?



The Continent of Tarkia is a unique world, and there are secrets to be discovered all around you – finding useful loot is a vital part of exploration. Wander, run, ride a horse, climb ropes, and fall as you travel from the depths of the deepest well to the glittering rooftops of Sonwonlo. Every choice you make drives your story forward, each decision leaving your mark on the world. Define your topmost priority, defeat boss-like enemies, and solve puzzles your way. No trouble resetting them. Leave and return.



Stroll the world using your power and yours alone or find great companions to join your world-saving-endeavors. Come up with the perfect synergies or strategies… or introduce additional elements by using the power of items. Battles seems complicated but they feel like a walk in the park when all pieces fall into place.



4 unique heroes offer a hand-crafted experience, each with their own unique traits, agenda, and outlook on the world. Their motivations and circumstances might differ, but they will come together to stop the true evil, because you know, it is their only world. Deny them and be headstrong or join forces.



Based on the traditional rules of Old Fantasy Games. Character-based initiative, advantage and disadvantage, and technique/magic abilities, attack/defend commands, and tactical turn-based combat that rewards strategy and foresight. Having 1, 2, 3 or 4 party members allows you to customise the challenge of combat. No escaping the tides of combat, but you might want to save on one of your 16 save slots before heading into the unknown.



Featuring a swift and versatile Monk, a strong and reliable Samurai and a smart and technical Archer class from the start, Journey of the Forgotten is set to grow. Over 100 spells and actions offer hundreds of one-of-a-kind battle situations, and the player's actions determine success or failure while allowing multiple winning strategies. Pass level 12 and become one of the strongest beings of the entire continent. With the current limit of 99, there might new challenges waiting for additional story chapters and endgame in general. Feel the love of an independant developer creating a unique experience for you and caring about it longer than others.



What is that? A long forgotten secret ingredients makes its way back into gaming. Have enjoyable conversations with the elderly or teach kids about keeping randomly found pets and saving the world. How will your own moral compass react to the topics you come across and do you think about things? Quia does and she won't keep her opionion suppressed. Will you see the fourth wall fall or will you speedrun the game and ignore additional one-of-a-kind dialogues?



No pants problems as Journey of the Forgotten aims at a younger and older audience which results in a streamer-friendly presentation. You’ll be able to stream Journey of the Forgotten without any problems, regardless of how you play, thanks to these facts.

item.title: NO TOMORROW
item.description:
About This Game

NO TOMORROW is a short horror/walking simulator game. It is set in a photorealistic liminal environment.

You are stuck in a loop. Pay close attention and look for anomalies. If you feel that something is off turn back. If not keep going. Reach to floor zero as soon as you can.

Features


Infinitely looping hallway

You find yourself stuck in an infite loop. There is only one way to escape the loop. You have to reach floor zero.

Thrilling anomalies

Observe your surroundings for unusual activities. If you catch an anomaly turn back immediately. If not keep going forward.

Realistic

Photo-realistic environments will immerse into a thrilling experience.

Play Time


Depending on your observation skill the game can last between 20-80 minutes.

item.title: GAMECINE VR
item.description:
About This Game

FEATURES & CONTENT



  • Short interactable movies in virtual reality

  • Each level, a different universe

  • The audience in your living room will watch you play in both first and third person camera

  • From calm to insane, from dinosaurs to aliens!

  • Cinematic shots and subtitles included

GAMECINE uses both seated and standing modes in VR.

PLANES (RELEASED ON AUGUST 20, 2022)

RANGERS (RELEASED ON JULY 20, 2022)

DINOS (RELEASED ON JUNE 20, 2022)

BITS (RELEASED ON MAY 20, 2022)

WIZARDS (RELEASED ON APRIL 20, 2022)

item.title: Ancient Wonders: Gardens of Babylon
item.description:
About This Game

The construction of a marvelous garden is about to start! King Nebuchadnezzar II wants to build a hanging garden for his wife Queen Amytis! Play through more than 100 levels and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Garden of Babylon!

Play through more than 100 levels in hex-match link style and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Gardens of Babylon!

Key Game Features

More than 100 hex-match-3 link style!
Variety of puzzles such as collapse, jigsaw and spot the difference!
Decorate the Gardens of Babylon!
Game Modes to choose from!

item.title: Main Deity Space
item.description:
About This Game

Preface:

"Main Deity Space" is my first attempt at making a game in my life. Since I have zero programming knowledge and can't understand code, Unreal Engine 5 (UE5) with its Blueprint system provided me with the opportunity to try my hand at creating a game that I love. I am extremely grateful to UE5 engine for this.

During the development process, I conducted testing by releasing a game full of bugs on the Steam platform. I received a lot of help from player friends who patiently tested the game and provided suggestions. I am truly, truly thankful for their support.

The version currently online is still very basic, with professions, skills, equipment, materials, enemies, and maps continuously being added. The game itself definitely has many issues, and I hope everyone can understand and provide feedback so that I can make continuous improvements and adjustments.

After the official version is released, the testing version will not be canceled and will continue to be updated. However, the official version will be given priority for updates, with the testing version being updated once a month.

Apart from the difference in update timing, the leaderboards between the two versions will not be connected, and the testing version will not participate in future reward activities. However, there will be no difference in gameplay and content between the two versions.

For those who are willing to support me, you can purchase the official version, and I am sincerely grateful for your support.

Below is the introduction to the game itself:

"Main Deity Space" is a small game inspired by games like "Vampire Survivors" and "Diablo".
The main theme is killing monsters, farming equipment, leveling up, drawing cards, farming materials, crafting equipment, upgrading followers, collecting pets, and so on.

Accidentally traversing into the realm of the Main Deity, embark on an endless cycle of slaughter. Strengthen yourself and your companions continuously through the trials initiated by the Main Deity.

Through trials, safely returning to the Main Deity's space allows you to initiate new trials and face new challenges. The rewards become more abundant with higher difficulties, but in the event of death, all gains will be lost. Upon a safe return, you can bring back the rewards obtained during the trials—currency, equipment, materials, and more. The Main Deity's space also facilitates the exchange of various items, including gems, equipment, enhancement materials, and even skill upgrades.

You can also craft various needed materials, totems, and even followers through the Main Deity.

At the same time, the Main Deity also provides a storage vault, allowing you to save items before embarking on an adventure. After all, if you cannot survive, you won't be able to bring back any items.
With the rich experience gained in battles, you will level up and acquire attribute points that can be allocated to strengthen attributes such as strength, life, mana, speed, and more. You will also earn skill points to upgrade skills as needed.

During the trial process, you can obtain or craft companions with different characteristics to assist you in battle. They are powerful and can also be upgraded with equipment and skills. They will engage in combat autonomously. Up to 5 different companions can coexist at the same time, providing the most powerful assistance.

Survive together with them!

item.title: Isop0dyssey
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into the trash-infested power fantasy of being a parasitic isopod on the seabed and gallop your fish steed in underground street races.

Welcome to Abyss City: the last link in a chain of seabed cities stretching from the shores to the unexplored depths of the ocean. Built on the edge of a deep sea trench, Abyss City is a polluted metropolis fueled by the garbage and waste of the world above.

As a parasitic isopod with the ability to ride fish, you are part of the logistics workforce that keeps the city running, but you are also an oppressed minority in a society dominated by higher isopods.

Break free from the cycle of oppression and win your way to the top of the underground street racing scene.

Features including, but not limited to:


-Realistic fish handling & power drifting

-Immersive factory shift mechanics

-A party platter of discoloured isopods to find & talk to

-Uncover secrets & mysteries of Abyss City, the world above and below

item.title: KeeperRL
item.description:
About This Game



KeeperRL is an ambitious dungeon simulator with roguelike and RPG elements. Take the role of an evil wizard and study the methods of black magic. Equip your minions and explore the world, murder innocent villagers and burn their homes. Build your dungeon, lay traps and prepare for an assault of angry heroes.

When you control your minions the game changes into a classic roguelike, with turn-based and very tactical combat. You can also play as an adventurer and assault dungeons made by you or other players.

Dungeon management

You will dig deep into the mountain and build dozens of rooms, corridors and traps. Your minions will train and produce weapons and armor. Prisoners will be tortured. You will research new technologies like alchemy, beast mutation and sorcery.

Z-levels

Develop your base across multiple floors by digging down into the earth or building up. Build fantastic dungeon designs or elaborate castles and towers.

Roguelike mechanics

The world is simulated on a very detailed level. Creatures use equipment and consumable items. There are dozens of special items, spells, attributes and special attacks. You can cut off heads and limbs and blind or poison your enemies. If you're not careful with fire, you can burn an entire forest or even your own dungeon.

Large, procedurally generated maps



KeeperRL features a large, procedurally generated world. Explore dozens of locations, from small cottages and shops to major enemies dwelling in castles and dungeons. Uncover secrets, bring back great loot and prisoners back to your base in order to grow in power.

Multiple playable factions



Play as a:
  • Dark wizard researching black magic.
  • White knight specialized in horses and angelic beings.
  • Necromancer who crafts undead from the body parts of fallen enemies.
  • Fragile colony of twelve dwarves.
  • Goblin king searching for his lost wives.
  • Collective of gnomes with a mechanized army.
  • Lone adventurer focused on exploration.

Online map sharing

KeeperRL offers the ability to download dungeons made by other players from Steam Workshop, and places them on your world map as enemies. See how others design their fortresses, fight with their minions, and steal their loot! After winning the game, you'll have the option to share your dungeon online as well.

item.title: ChronoDojo
item.description:
About This Game



Play solo or party with friends in this cute, cooperative combination of tower defense and beat 'em up action! Travel through time, leap through levels, quickly construct trusty towers, and battle against wave after wave of zany enemies!

Will you become a master of Chrono-Fu and save the world from evil?

    Play as adorable, humble heroes! (Custodian, Cook, Gardener, Fixer, Deliverer, Nurse)
    Bash baddies, build towers and battle bosses in three unique times in history!
    Accelerate and slow the flow of time in each level to achieve maximum victory!
    Unlock an arsenal of stylish shoes, wacky weapons, powerful pets and beverage boosts!
    Loveable, light-hearted and fast-paced fun for all ages and skill levels!

    Keyboard support for 1 player.
    Controller support for 1-4 players.
    (at least one controller required for local multiplayer)

item.title: Taka Taka
item.description:
About This Game



Inspired by traditional Japanese folklore, Taka Taka is a rhythm game about surviving the world of Yokai. Play as Tengu and Oni, an unlikely pair with distinct strengths and weaknesses. Battle your way through the waves of hand-drawn enemies, timing your attacks to the exciting music tracks.



With three different levels of difficulty, Taka Taka will always keep you on the edge of your seat! Compete against your friends on the leaderboard, or just focus on beating your high score. There is always more complexity with Taka Taka!



Features:
  • Three Difficulty Levels: Easy, Medium, and DEMON
  • 5 Hand Drawn Zones
  • Steam Deck Compatibility (COMING SOON)
  • Unique music tracks for all 14 levels
  • Friend leaderboards

item.title: Secrets of Grindea
item.description:
About This Game

Secrets of Grindea is an old-school Action RPG with co-op support for up to 4 players. It is a tribute to and sometimes a parody of the old SNES games so many of us grew up with and loved! Journey through fantastical lands, and battle tons of different enemies and bosses in your quest for truth, friendship and, above all, finding the world's rarest treasures!

Key Features


  • A rich world filled with 300+ unique, colorful characters and an engaging story to drive your journey forward.
  • Co-op support for up to four players! Enjoy the entire storyline with your friends or call someone in to help with the more difficult challenges.
  • Customization, customization, customization - design a character that represents you, then mix and match any of the 31 spells and skills across 9 different categories.
  • 30+ epic boss fights! Overgrown slimes, giant robots, mimics - we have it all!
  • Side content - design your own home, fish, craft items, tame pets, partake in mini-games, grow plants - there’s plenty to keep you entertained when you want a break from the main story.

And last but not least:

  • Arcade Mode - Separate from Story Mode, the game includes a full roguelite version where you need to battle your way to the top on a single life, building a town of your own as you progress. How far can you get?

item.title: DRAGON BALL FighterZ
item.description:
About This Game



DRAGON BALL FighterZ is born from what makes the DRAGON BALL series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters.

Partnering with Arc System Works, DRAGON BALL FighterZ maximizes high end Anime graphics and brings easy to learn but difficult to master fighting gameplay.

High-end Anime Graphics
Using the power of the Unreal engine and the talented team at Arc System Works, DRAGON BALL FighterZ is a visual tour-de-force.

3vs3 Tag/Support
Build your dream team and sharpen your skills to master high-speed tag combinations.

Thrilling Online Features
Ranked matches, interactive lobby, crazy 6-player Party Match... There is something for every taste!

Exclusive Story Mode
Discover a never-seen-before scenario featuring Android 21, a brand new character whose creation was supervised by Akira Toriyama himself.

Spectacular Fights
Experience aerial combos, destructible stages and famous scenes from the DRAGON BALL anime in 60FPS and 1080p resolution!

item.title: Doggo Estates
item.description:
About This Game

Doggo Estates finally reaches Full Release!

After:
- 454 days since the early access release,
- Single-player mode added,
- Steam achievements added,
- Full controller support,
- And much more,
we've made it to version 1.0. and a Full Release of Doggo Estates!
Thank you very much!

The doggo real estate market is more competitive than ever!

Select your favorite dog appearance and jump into a multiplayer party game of peeing around the neighborhood. 

Join our community on Discord and talk directly with devs and other fans around the world.

Find an unclaimed house and cash-in your warm liquid gold

and the property is yours! The clock is ticking, and your opponents never sleep, so make sure you pee on as many houses as possible, but don't forget to drink and eat.



You can quickly run out of your liquid currency, and delicious bones can give you the upper hand. If you come across a giant, swiftly moving motorized beast, get out of the way - you don't want to go to doggy heaven just yet.


Don't make a poop and try your luck! Woof, woof.

Features:
- Choose from 10 different dog breed
- Third person dog game
- Multiplayer action game
- With up to 8 players per room
- Play with friends or meet new players
- Different play modes
- A easy-in tutorial
- Traffic dogging

item.title: Type King
item.description:
About This Game

Type King is a typing and jumping game. With three different game modes all of which have three difficulty levels there is plenty to play here! The land is split into fifteen states all of which are led by corrupt governors from their high towers. It is up to you to rid the land of corruption by overruling the leaders of those states. Only then can you be crowned the Type King!

Jumping
This might look easy but I assure you it is not. A vital skill for every Type King which makes this game mode a good place to start your journey.


Typing
Hone your typing skills with this game mode where both speed and accuracy are needed. With the different difficulty levels there is challenge for everyone!


Type King
Typing and jumping combined makes Type King! There are three varieties of this game mode: Multiplayer co-op where one player is typing and the other is jumping as well as singleplayer variants where you type with one hand and jump with the other.


Save progress by unlocking codes
In Easy and Normal difficulty the checkpoints between floors include codes which can be used in the menu to continue where you left off. These aren't there to help in Hard difficulty so just keep practising!

Accessibility
Type King is family-friendly and can be enjoyed by people of any age! It also has option for easy to read font.

Keyboard layouts
Supports QWERTY, AZERTY and QWERTZ keyboard layouts

Comments
This is absolutely horrible. This is the hardest game I've ever played!
-Developer's eight years old cousin who can't get enough of Type King

After hours of trying I finally saw the top of the tower in Jumping on Hard difficulty and then I fell and now I'm losing my mind
-Developer's friend (could be former friend now)

item.title: The Warehouse
item.description:
About This Game

Objectives

Get the crowbar
Get the office key
Get the exit key in the office
Flip the levers to open the blast door blocking off sector 3
Get the bolt cutters
Run to the exit

Anomalies

There are anomalies roaming the warehouse waiting to catch you. Luckily this warehouse is used to this kind of thing and there are posters around the facility teaching you each of the anomalies behaviors and how to avoid them! Their names are:
The Old One
Omni
The Observer
Bohonk

Your Tools

There's a button in one of the sectors that can freeze the anomalies.
You have a flashlight that runs out of battery luckily there are batteries all around the facility in order to replenish it!
Coffee in the break room can help you run faster! But careful it's a one time use!

Settings and Progress

This game has multiple settings that are saved when leaving the game so you never have to fiddle with them when you come back for more! The game also has multiple difficulties that impacts the game in different ways.
This game will save your progress when you beat one of its difficulties and leave a nice message at the top right of your menu and hovering over each message gives you some nice flavor text.

Easter Eggs and Lore

This game has lore across all of the sectors and the office!
Beating the game on hard will reveal a nice hidden surprise.

Credit to Mephis for trailer and title screen music.
Credit to Krissy for voice lines and all graphic designs.
Credit to sketchfab for amazing models.

item.title: CAT SHORT WAY
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the exciting world of adventure “Cat Shortcut”! In this interesting side-view arcade game, an incredible journey awaits you, where you will play a brave cat, whose task is to save an old, mysterious factory from our evil mice and crows.

Your cat has an incredible skill - technology for planning along walls and ceilings, which allows him to view the plant from unusual angles and find hidden corners. This is especially useful when chasing and catching mice and crows. You will have to overcome difficulties and problems along the way. Use your dexterity and abilities to catch all the mice and defeat the crows. When you successfully catch the mice, you will have the option to jump into the box, which will teleport you to the next challenge.

Join the brave cat in his exciting adventure and help him save the old factory from our mice and crows in the game "Cat Shortcut". You are captivated by the waiting and dangerous moments, many riddles that need to be solved! Good luck, hero!

Game Features:
  • Addictive gameplay and dynamic levels.
  • Many interesting locations inside the old factory.
  • Difficulty levels for players of all ages.
  • Original soundtrack and funny sound effects.

item.title: Rain Runner
item.description:
About This Game



RAIN. RUNNER.
Rain Runner is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS where you ditch your keyboard and only use your mouse! You’ll run constantly where you look, shoot targets and dash through challenging platforms. No checkpoints, no pauses: beat it in one sitting! Run, die, learn, repeat. Be better, be faster.

FEATURES.
  • 👟25 handcrafted, fast, and hard levels
  • 🕘About 30mins gameplay (unlimited, if you're up for challenge)
  • ⚔️Steam Leaderboard (best player featured in the main menu *wow*)
  • 🎶An original soundtrack consisting of 6 tracks
  • 🏆Cool achievements!
  • 💾NO saves and pauses, beat in one sitting!
  • ☠️Annoying meta-dialogues


Hi, it's SkyBrave! I make short games every month and sharing my journey for you!

item.title: Welcome to ParadiZe
item.description:
About This Game



Do you want your very own zombie companion? A faithful friend that protects you from its peers and accompanies you on all your adventures? At ParadiZe, we make it happen! Here, the zombies do all the dirty work.



In the beautiful country of ParadiZe, ingenious survivors are testing a technology that can be used to control the zombies that have overrun the world. Once hacked, they become invaluable allies, even though they are not that smart and sometimes rather unstable.
It's not all rosy in ParadiZe, but if you're reasonably clever and handy, maybe you'll manage to survive…





Explore ParadiZe and meet a colourful cast of extraordinary characters. The unusual flora and fauna will surprise you at every turn. Set out on adventure, in the snow or desert, alone or with your Zombot companions, and feel free to get rid of any pests that try to disturb your stay with us.
Fancy an expedition into the wilderness or would you prefer to laze about at your camp? It's your choice, so tailor your stay as you see fit!
However, we recommend not getting too close to the locals: they can be somewhat… aggressive.





Shortly after arriving, you must build your camp, a cosy little nest that you can gradually upgrade. Comfort is important, but don't forget to set up defences! Add multiple traps and fortifications to repel zombies, which have the bad habit of never leaving you alone.
It takes effort to maintain a camp, but if you don't like such menial tasks, don't worry: as we already told you, zombies do all the dirty work here.





You can be a loner during your stay or more sociable.
Invite up to three of your friends so they can enjoy this unforgettable experience with you.
ParadiZe welcomes everyone with open arms!

item.title: Tamarak Trail
item.description:
About This Game

In this deck-building roguelike, you'll use a customizable dice set as you battle through randomly generated trails - full of loot, mysteries, and danger to protect inhabitants from the evil that has corrupted the trail.

As a member of the Sturgeon Lodge: a secret society tasked with defeating a malevolent presence that has corrupted Tamarak Trail, it is your job to bring peace to all inhabitants.







Choose from a myriad of dice sides to create powerful synergies and manipulate the battlefield. Chain re-rolling and turning abilities to achieve unimaginable power!





You'll play as one of three character classes: The Detective, the Magician, and the Tracker to dig up clues & find game-changing artifacts about the source of evil.





Enjoy the endless replayability of a randomly generated Trail, with different bosses, objectives, and encounters. Select your path carefully and manage your resources to see your adventure to the end.





Some items have been permanently imbued with the reality-warping power inhabiting the Trail. Collect them to gain more dice or drastically change your character's battle style.

item.title: Furry Myth 🦁
item.description:
About This Game





Nice soft visual style, soothing lofi soundtrack, Furry Goddess, mysterious plot and funny dialogues. The most relaxing educational game for immersion in Greek mythology.

The ship of the Greek hero Odysseus is approaching the mysterious island after many months of wandering at sea. Unexplored forests and temple ruins hold mystical secrets. Odysseus' crew is greeted on the shore by the attractive pig girl Circe. This is where the plot of Furry Myth 🦁 begins.


This visual novel with elements of match3 is created for your comfort and relaxation.
Enter a world where ancient legends merge with furries, where gods and heroes find new forms, and where your actions shape the destiny of both realms. Embark on an unforgettable adventure in Furry Myth 🦁 a visual novel that will captivate your imagination and leave a lasting impact on your heart.
Immerse yourself in a vibrant world where gods, goddesses, and furry heroes come alive.

Features:

  • Chiil
  • Furry Goddess
  • PIG!
  • 60+ levels
  • 5 Lovely Furry Girls
  • 3 in a row

item.title: Multiplayer Platform Golf
item.description:
About This Game

Physics Based Golfing

Switch between the driver, wood, iron, and putter, each offering a different way to tackle the courses.

Platforming

Golfing is just the beginning. Leap, dash, and navigate through tricky platforming segments.

Multiplayer

Play online with up to 12 friends. Or if you're feeling adventurous, join public lobbies and meet new golfing buddies!

Give Us Feedback!

item.title: Nyctophobia: Fear the Dark
item.description:
About This Game

“Nyctophobia: Fear the Dark” is a first-person horror survival game based on SCP and Foundation lore. You play as a foundation detention class member sent to investigate the brutal massacre of the residents of Erfurt Village (a gated community located in the modern-day Midwest) with nothing but a flashlight to protect themselves. During the player’s investigation, they discover the anomaly hunts its victims using fear, how it spreads from one location to another, how it came into existence, and how it broke containment. The player will use their flashlight to navigate the small spaces. As the creature toys with the player they will need to solve puzzles and defeat the creature in deadly games of tag and hide-n-seek in order to survive.

item.title: Ad Infernum
item.description:
About This Game

After experiencing a devastating car crash in the middle of the desert, you awaken stranded at a long-abandoned gas station. A voice on the radio calls out to you, trapped nearby but just out of reach. Together you discover remnants of a missing cult, unholy rituals, a mysterious cavern, and bloodthirsty creatures hunting you both down. With the walls closing in, can you follow in the cultist's footsteps and complete their final ritual -- before it's too late?

Lose Your Mind

Witnessing horrors will chip away at your psyche, depicted by your Nerve meter. As you slowly lose touch with reality, audiovisual hallucinations and other unforeseen consequences will begin to manifest. The effects of a weakened mind are wide-ranging and completely unscripted - meaning any manner of horrors can happen at any time.

Fight

Face threats head-on with a wide variety of guns and melee weapons. From hammers, to nailguns, axes, baseball bats, shotguns, and much more. All weapons are able to be upgraded to fit your needs.

Scavenge

Discover valuable supplies hidden away in every corner of the world. Use them at-will, or break them down in to raw materials to be used in arcane transmutation. Collect recipes to unlock the ability to transmute these materials into completely new items.

Hide

Avoid dangers by keeping a low profile. Create distractions by making noise, or take to the shadows to remain unseen. Flip switches or shoot out lights to gain the element of surprise, or power them all on to see what's lurking in the darkness.

Run

Escape your pursuers with a mixture of both agility and ingenuity. Vault over barricades, slide under obstacles, and climb anything to put distance between you and imminent death.

Improvise

No key for that door? Find a hole in the wall. Break a window. Crawl through a hatch. Climb up a pipe. Every encounter is designed with numerous solutions in mind, further multiplied by emergent systems allowing for completely new ways to tackle problems.

item.title: The Idle
item.description:
About This Game

The Idle is the absolute version of all idle clicker games brought together. Infinite possibilities, infinite gameplay, infinite fun.

CLICKS OR GENERATORS

Choose the way you prefer more to generate income. Or use both of them simultaneously. No limits!

CURRENCIES AND POSSIBILITIES

Earn seven different currencies that can be exchanged between each other. Each currency can be used to buy specific upgrades.

INTEREST AND RISKY INCOME

Invest your funds into stable interest profit or take the risk and use a bets system to get a jackpot instantly!

ULTIMATE PRESTIGE

You can buy prestige upgrades almost for everything. Don't limit yourself choosing between two or more options. Just buy them all!

PERKS AND SUPER UPGRADES

Enormous amount of perks is available to boost your income. Buy special super upgrades that change the whole game!

ACHIEVEMENTS AND CHALLENGES

Try to collect all one hundred achievements and sooner or later complete the game.

SETUP YOUR OWN LOOK

Choose between dark and light theme, change in-game fonts and many more!

The Idle offers endless possibilities and fun. Try it now and see for yourself!

item.title: A Void Hope
item.description:
About This Game

Set out on a journey through a harsh and unforgiving city

These waters... You know, sometimes I feel them rising in me. Dark and suffocating. Like something growing. A beast.

A Void Hope takes you on an atmospheric narrative adventure to find a cure for a collapsed city. Follow the story of a tormented couple as they try to decipher reality from nightmares and evade the shadowy threats lurking in the dark.

An immersive experience

  • Solve puzzles, find items and progress through the story in this world brimming with mysterious ambiance

Something lurks in the shadows

  • Crisp retro aesthetics combined with atmospheric lighting shows a world in darkness but with small slivers of hope

Avoid combat, embrace exploration

  • Delve into an adventure filled with danger and make your way through the city avoiding the threats that come your way

A haunting soundtrack

  • Composed by synthwave mastermind Waveshaper, an eerie and evocative landscape of music accompanies your every step



A Void Hope’s compelling mystery and carefully-crafted ambiance is supported by puzzle platforming mechanics that require you to solve puzzles and find items as you traverse the city. There are dangerous threats wandering the streets too, but your goal is to avoid conflict in this narrative-focused adventure where unwinding the threads of the unknown by exploring the secrets of the city’s physical space, along with the psychological space of your struggling protagonists, will be your primary focus.

A short and immersive experience enjoyed best in a single sitting on a rainy, dark night.

Features
  • Story written by published horror and science-fiction writer Frida Windelhed
  • Sound Design by Christian Björklund, previously Audio Designer on Little Nightmares
  • Soundtrack by Waveshaper (Furi OST, The Crew 2 from Ubisoft, Netflix, Videoman)
  • Additional Art by Rickard Paulsson (Bionic Commando, Syndicate, Gunborg)

A Void Hope is the latest game from developer and publisher Elden Pixels, purveyor of quality boutique releases and creators of Alwa's Awakening & Alwa's Legacy.

item.title: Crowded Mysteries
item.description:
About This Game

TIME TO SOLVE CRIME!


You're Mystery City's greatest... well, almost only detective.
Your job is to investigate the crimes that plague the city, so that your moustached detective-cop partner can interrogate suspects.

(And oh dear, there's a lot of crimes and suspects....)

Look for clues - some obvious, some strange, some unfairly hidden away...
What, did you think it's always a fair deal for a detective? As if criminals would leave their tracks exposed? Ha!
Lucky for you, you've got 4D vision... Across time and space.... (maybe that's why you're an invaluable detective!)

If you're fast, gain stars. If you take your time... well, don't? It's not like you need them. But they're oooh so shiny...

Anyway, don't waste time for chitchat. Put on your detective hat and solve some crimes!

item.title: Hidden Winter Cats
item.description:
About This Game

❄️ Find 100 hidden kitties in this snowy location - free!

🌈 Paint them in your favorite colors just by clicking on them. It only takes 5 minutes of your free time.


Key features:


❄️ 1 big level absolutely free
🐾 100 various hidden cats
🎧 15+ real meow sounds
🎨 Choice of colors for painting
🔮 Hint system
🎯 Camera zoom in and out
🎮 Gamepad support
🧩 100 achievements
👨‍👩‍👦 Suitable for all ages
🏆 Also 1 bonus level:

🔍 Can you find all the hidden cats?
